0.1.name: wordpress/web-intent-tweet-button
0.1.description: Web Intent Tweet Button adds "Tweet Button" below every post of your WordPress powered site. Web Intent provide popup optimized flow for your tweets. They make the users to interact with their followers without leaving the page, instead they provide popub based window for your tweets. More information about Web Intents can be found here https://dev.twitter.com/docs/intents.
